itunes:title: Episode 824 - Talking NFT's With Special Guests Michael Heller And James Salzman
title: Episode 824 - Talking NFT's With Special Guests Michael Heller And James Salzman
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by NFT experts Michael Heller and James Salzer to talk about the future of NFTs, if they hold any real value, how much ownership you actually have over the content of an NFT you’ve purchased, and how NFTs are va...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by NFT experts Michael Heller and James Salzer to talk about the future of NFTs, if they hold any real value, how much ownership you actually have over the content of an NFT you’ve purchased, and how NFTs are valued versus how cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Etherium are valued.
